Equations for probability distributions. 

This post is under construction.

## Exponential 

$$Y\sim\text{Exp}(\mu)=\frac{1}{\mu}e^{\mu y}$$

## Normal 

$$Y\sim\text{N}(\mu,\sigma)=\frac{1}{\sigma\sqrt{2\pi}}e^{-\frac{1}{2}(\frac{y-\mu}{\sigma})}$$

## Poisson

$$Y\sim\text{Pois}(\lambda)=\frac{\lambda^y}{y!}e^{-\lambda}$$
